description:
This course is not sponsored by or affiliated with Udemy, Inc.

Learn how to start making money in 4 weeks or less teaching online courses with this simple and fast step by step system.

Transform yourself from someone who trades hours for dollars, and can only make as much money as you have hours to trade...

...Into someone who invests several hours creating an awesome online course, then gets paid for those same hours and that course over and over again! 

That's the magic of leveraging and scaling your time with a product that you create, rather than just getting paid for only the hours you show up to work for someone else

Authors use it... Musicians use it... Software developers use it... now you can use it with online courses!

Be free, live life on YOUR own terms. Earn money for what YOU know, what YOU are passionate about.

Create online courses and live where you want, work when and where you want, travel the world, or just have more free time at home. Learn how to create an online course

Take Action! Click the green "Take This Course" button above and let's get started

••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••

In This Course, You'll Learn How To:

  • Choose a profitable course topic on things you know well
  • Quickly research & teach other topics you don't know well
  • Rapidly organize your ideas into a simple course outline
  • Create and follow a rapid, step by step system to build your course
  • Rapidly create high quality course content that's simple and fun to produce
  • Market and sell your course daily to millions of students worldwide
  • How to make a Udemy course in one weekend

••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••

Read What Past Students Say About This Course:

"This course is fabulous! Kind of like the cliff notes for combining all the other "make a course" courses. With the best stuff distilled down and presented in an engaging and simple format. James Forno has a home run with this course!" - Lan Anders

"I enjoyed the course and felt motivated to use the information as the layout and instructions were so clear cut. The bonus material recommending another tutor confirmed my opinion that James really wants his students to succeed." - Loreen

"Unlike many boring courses on Udemy with monotonous voices reading bullets- points off the screen, this instructor's teaching style is clear, direct, and engaging. Each individual lecture is a gem, not too long, not too short, with enough meat to get me chomping at the bit to start applying what I just learned right away. Even though he advises the students good enough is better than perfection, it's extremely difficult to not produce a quality course when you apply the instructor's (my favorite part) method of outlining." - Tiffany Nguyen

••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••••

Learn how to make a Udemy course. Learning how to make a online course is easy if you follow this system. The steps to leaning how to make an online course are simple.

title: How to Create a Udemy Course: Fast Start System -Unofficial
